resources.string: It exhibits two plaques in tribute to leaders of the municipality. You can enjoy good trees, benches and grocery stalls. Santa B치rbara is a municipality, located in the Southwest subregion of the department of Antioquia.

They call it "Hidden Nativity" due to the topographic situation in which it is located: surrounded by mountains and hills, forming a beautiful landscape. Some houses from the colonial era and the cobblestones from Main Street to Real Street, declared Architectural Heritage by the Municipal Council of Santa B치rbara, are still preserved.
Hill overlooking the Cauca river canyon. From here paragliding is practiced.
In the limits with the municipality of Caldas, from where you can see Santa B치rbara, the Cauca River, the Poblanco River and other municipalities in Southeastern Antioquia. With restaurant services.
-Route to Alto de Minas Water Wealth. -Route of the River Buey, sport fishing. -Adventure route along the Poblanco River.
My name is Diego Giraldo S치nchez, I am a Software development student at CESDE
